articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces' Drill for Landing on Island
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces' Drill for Landing on Island
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the drill of the KPA ground, naval, air and anti-air forces for landing on an  island.
					 Participating in the drill were combatants, artillery pieces of various calibers, combat ships including submarines, and formations of pursuit fighters, bombers and transport planes of units of the ground, naval, air and anti-air forces of the KPA.
					
					 He mounted an observation post and heard a report on the drill plan and issued an order to start the drill.
					
					 The moment the drill site looked like an active volcano.
					
					 Huge pillars of flames shot up from the island of the "enemies" in succession.
					
					 Watching the KPA forces successively pounding the "positions" through the well-organized coordinated operation as required by the modern warfare, he said it was possible to deal deadly blows at the enemies through initial strikes if the time for striking was properly fixed and fire was concentrated on them through prompt, accurate and united actions.
					
					 The deadly firepower strikes on the island were followed by infantrymen's landing on the island and paratroopers' action.
					
					 Watching them occupying the island at a lightning speed through a pair of binoculars, he said they were excellent and deserved to be called a-match-for-a-hundred fighters as they underwent intensive training day and night with the extraordinary awareness that a combat drill should be carried out as scheduled.
					
					 Signal flares arched across the sky reporting that the island has been completely put under control.
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction that the drill was successful as it met the requirements of the Juche-based war method.
					
					 He congratulated the participants in the drill on their success, reviewing combat ships aboard a warship.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the People's Army into the ever-victorious revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 "History proves that it is impossible to protect the destiny of the country and its people unless the army is bolstered up," he said, underscoring the need to put more spurs to increasing the military strength which means the sovereignty of the country and the nation and the national power.
					
					 Calling on the KPA to intensify the training essential for augmenting the military strength, he instructed the commanding officers to thoroughly do away with formalistic, ready-made and stylish practices in training and steadily improve forms, contents and methods of training as required by the modern warfare.
					
					 He instructed them to frequently organize a similar drill in the future, always bearing in mind training means a battle.
					
					 He called on the whole army to defend the sky, land and seas of the socialist homeland as firm as an iron wall, watching every movement of the enemies with vigilance.
					
					 Recalling that the inviolable waters on the southwestern front of the country are exposed to frequent threat due to a handful of enemies and there was a dangerous incident in which the shells fired by them dropped in territorial waters of the DPRK some days ago, too, he said he took it very serious and he was closely watching them. He strongly warned that should the enemies repeat the wrong choice on the wrong day in the hotspot waters, he would make them regret bitterly for their action.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the KPA General Staff, and Army General Pyon In Son, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of its Operation Bureau.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Hanggu, July 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Yongsong Min Ok, a woman centenarian living in Sangbisok-dong in Hanggu District, Nampho City on Friday.
					 Born into a worker's family in Tokyo, Japan a century ago, she came to Korea with her father. After marrying a Korean man she went to China.
					
					 She came back to the DPRK where a new life was in full bloom with her husband in Juche 38 (1949) and enjoyed a happy life under the warm care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War she worked hard for the victory of the war in the rear to do the share of her husband who was fallen on the front.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea took warm care of her life so that she might not live in gloom.
					
					 She sincerely worked for the socialist country and kept herself busy with work even after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She is hard-working and optimistic and likes to sing. She enjoys fish and vegetables.

articles.title: Korean and Chinese People Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Arrive
articles.content:
Korean and Chinese People Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Arrive
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Korean and Chinese people related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle arrived here on Saturday to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. They are family of Chinese Hu Zhenyi, families of Liu Tong-shi, Sun Mingren and Fan Delin, family of Korean So Sun Ok, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China, families of Korean Pak Kil Song and Kim Chol, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs, family of Korean Kim Sun Ok, who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and family of overseas Korean Son Won Thae who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.

articles.title: Delegations of Chongryon Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegations of Chongryon Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Koreans in Japan, delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), delegation of elder officials of Chongryon, delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, delegation of the officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, delegation of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China and delegation of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 The members of the delegations placed bunches of flowers before the statues in deep reverence for the peerless great men and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Earlier, the vice-chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia paid tribute to the statues.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Here
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok arrived here on Saturday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Here
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Koreans in Japan led by Kwon Sun Hwi, advisor of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Saturday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Arrive
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Arrive
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans' delegations arrived here on Saturday to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. They are a delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon; delegation of elder officials of Chongryon led by Han Hak Su, advisor to the Council of Korea University of Chongryon; delegation of officials of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong; delegation of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China led by Vice-Chairman Ri Won Ryong; and delegation of the  Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China led by Sim Hong Gwang, chairman of the Yanbian Regional Association. 
					 Rim Min Sik, chairman of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and his party and Jong Ki Ryol, Korean in the U.S. who is the editor-in-chief of The Fourth Media, a website of China, also arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: International Internet Seminar Held
articles.content:
International Internet Seminar Held
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The International Internet Seminar on the theme of "Kim Il Sung-great man in the century" took place from June 26 to 28 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The seminar was held in Jakarta, Indonesia by way of posting on the internet the speeches of personages of committees for remembering Kim Il Sung organized in various regions and countries of the world, friendship and solidarity organizations and representatives of organizations for the study of the Juche idea and personages of political and social circles.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Also on display there were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on show there were photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were more than 150 personages of various circles of Indonesia. The DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and his embassy officials were present on invitation.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the memory of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, made an opening speech and Eko Suryo Santjojo, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung, a keynote report.
					
					 The reporter praised the President as the distinguished leader and greatest man in the era of independence as he performed the immortal exploits by battling his way against fortitude and ordeals along with the vibrant 20th century.
					
					 Congratulatory messages sent by the former Nepali prime minister, organizations of different countries and international organizations to the seminar were introduced.
					
					 Participating in the seminar were over 70 personages of various circles from nearly 50 countries and regions including Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, Alexandr Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK. They posted their speeches under such titles as "President Kim Il Sung is immortal in the hearts of humankind" and "The sun rose over Mangyongdae".
					
					 An appeal to the progressives in the world was adopted there.
					
					 The appeal underscored the need to positively conduct diverse activities to study and disseminate the great exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and extend support to the just measures being taken by the DPRK for the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in International Internet Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in International Internet Seminar
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The participants in the International Internet Seminar held on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung presented a letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un on June 28.
					 The letter said that the participants held the seminar to remember Kim Il Sung who is boundlessly revered by all peoples as the most prominent great man in the 20th century, adding that they highly praised the exploits performed by him at the seminar.
					
					 It also said that they spoke highly of the exploits H.E. Kim Jong Il performed by making a great contribution to justice and peace in the world and expressed full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, united close around H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The just cause of the Korean people and the global cause of independence will advance straight along the road of victory thanks to Kim Jong Un and the day when mankind will live in a new independent century will surely come, the letter said
					
					 It said they will fully support all the lines and policies set forth by Kim Jong Un and always stand on the side of the Korean people wisely led by him.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Surveys of Construction of Wisong Scientists Street and Remodeling of May Day Stadium
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Surveys of Construction of Wisong Scientists Street and Remodeling of May Day Stadium
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA)-- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of the construction of Wisong Scientists Street and the remodeling of the May Day Stadium.
					 Going round various places of the construction sites, the premier encouraged the builders working a fresh miracle through a collective innovation movement, in hearty response to the instructions given by Marshal Kim Jong Un while providing field guidance to them.
					
					 He called on the builders to step up the construction on the highest level so that they may take responsibility for the safety of the projects and guarantee their absolute quality for all eternity and widely introduce the advanced building methods. He underscored the need to satisfactorily supply materials needed for the finishing projects.

articles.title: DPRK Channels Big Efforts into Preventing Flood Damage
articles.content:
DPRK Channels Big Efforts into Preventing Flood Damage
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is pushing ahead with the work to prevent flood damage.
					 Officials and other people across the country are stepping up the work to readjust rivers and streams, prevent landslides and repair roads in a bid to protect the precious assets of the country including land and forests.
					
					 Counties have laid earth of more than 80,000 cubic meters, laid feldspars of at least 30,000 square meters and filled stones of about 15,000 cubic meters to repair dikes.
					
					 Embankments have been readjusted in Kaesong, Huichon and Nampho cities.
					
					 Counties qualitatively repaired minor embankments to prevent land from washing away. Counties adjacent to mountains are channeling big efforts to anti-landslide projects.
					
					 Counties in North Hwanghae Province readjusted drainage systems.
					
					 Forestry management stations readjusted waterways to prevent tree nurseries from being inundated and built various structures.
					
					 All provinces are scrupulously organizing road repair and management.

articles.title: Cutting Fluid for CNC Machine Tools Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Cutting Fluid for CNC Machine Tools Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cermet Tools Development Company in the DPRK has developed a new kind of water-soluble cutting fluid for CNC machine tools.
					 This fluid, made with polyphosphate and various additives, helps increase the metal cutting speed of CNC machine tools as well as raise the production efficiency.
					
					 It has been already applied to the Taean Heavy Machine Complex and other industrial establishments, winning popularity.

articles.title: Signal Success Made in Fishery of DPRK
articles.content:
Signal Success Made in Fishery of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's Ministry of Fisheries has carried out its first half-yearly quota at 122.4 percent, in response to the call of supreme leader Kim Jong Un for developing the nation's fishery to improve the people's livelihood as intended by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Under his deep care, the August 25 Fishery Station took the lead in fishing last year. Encouraged by its success, all other fishery stations across the country turned out in a drive to increase the number of outings for fishing, further update the fishery and intensify aquaculture.
					
					 In the first half of this year, fishery stations run by the Korean People's Army caught tiny shrimp nearly five times the average yearly output in the past. 
					
					In a little more than two months, the fishery stations and cooperatives in the west coast under the Ministry of Fisheries caught tiny shrimp more than three times that in the same period of last year. And they caught 15,000 more tons of tiny shrimps up to June 20.
					
					 The ministry built hundreds of hectares of sea culture ground and met the yearly seaweeds quota set 1.3 times higher than last year.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Effort to Planting Evodia Daniellii
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Effort to Planting Evodia Daniellii
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK directs big efforts to creating forests of Evodia daniellii, which has been cultivated in Korea from olden times.
					 Under a detailed plan, relevant organs of the country have pushed the afforestation of Evodia daniellii in a mass campaign.
					
					 The Sohung County Evodia daniellii Forest Station in North Hwanghae Province established a system of cultivating saplings and supplied more than 10 tons of seeds, 1 500 000 saplings and 1 700 000 high-yielding grafted branches. The station has bred high-yielding species for last 20 years, perfecting the technology of its cultivation.
					
					 Similar stations in Kangdong County and Samsok District of Pyongyang concentrate efforts on cultivating Evodia daniellii on a scientific basis to reap more fruits this year. Meanwhile Riwon County in South Hamgyong Province created 10-odd hectares of Evodia daniellii in the spring.
					
					 In recent 10 years, more than 50 000 hectares of Evodia daniellii forest have been created throughout the country. 
					
					 Oil of Evodia daniellii is used not only for food but also as raw materials for production of high-grade soap and paints.
					
					 Contained in one ton of this oil are 3.2 kilograms of natural vitamin E, and the technology of its extraction was recently developed in the country.

articles.title: Songun Politics Serves as Ever-victorious Treasured Sword of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Politics Serves as Ever-victorious Treasured Sword of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword for defending the security of the socialist homeland and the people as firm as an impregnable fortress and for opening up the road to prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The building of a thriving socialist nation is accompanied with fierce showdown with the imperialists. 
					
					 The imperialists do not want Korean-style socialism getting stronger and the Korean people enjoying a happy life but persistently resort to the moves for a war of aggression to stifle the DPRK by force at any cost.
					
					 The present situation goes to clearly prove the precious truth of the revolution that in order to achieve victory in the showdown with the imperialists, it is necessary to hold fast to arms.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as the socialist fortress thanks to the idea and fighting spirit of the army and the people as well as the firm foundation of the great army-people unity.
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics serves as a weapon of prosperity that helps create the Korean speed and bring about ceaseless miracles in the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 In recent years, monumental edifices have been successfully built and shining successes registered in building a highly-civilized socialist country. This is a shining fruition brought about by the revolutionary spirit and fighting traits of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army.
					
					 The charging spirit, bold and innovative creation traits and fighting traits are the spirit of Songun Korea which is making a leaping progress toward prosperity.

articles.title: Special Proposal of NDC of DPRK Is Patriotic One: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Special Proposal of NDC of DPRK Is Patriotic One: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The special proposal made by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK is a patriotic one which can be accepted by anyone who is concerned about the destiny and future of the nation.
					 The improvement of the north-south relations desired by the whole nation can not be achieved by one side's unilateral efforts only.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The improvement can only be realized by easing the political and military confrontation and promoting the reconciliation, unity and cooperation, while giving priority to the requirements and interests of the nation on the three principles of national reunification which the authorities of the north and the south jointly agreed and solemnly declared at home and abroad, and in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 If one pays lip-service to "dialogue" but slanders the other side and seeks the confrontational rackets behind the scene, the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south can never be dispelled and no progress can be expected in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 So, the NDC of the DPRK sent the special proposal to the south Korean authorities as they had sought only the confrontation and mocked at the reunification issue with the wicked "assertions" and "declarations". The special proposal was out of the desire that they would handle all problems between the north and the south on the principle of independence, not imitating others and listening to others.
					
					 Invariable is the stand and will of the DPRK to mend the north-south ties on the three principles of national reunification and in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself and defend peace on the Korean peninsula and usher in a turning phase for national prosperity.
					
					 Whether the road for developing the north-south relations and achieving national reunification and national prosperity is open or not depends on the south Korean authorities' attitude.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Tightening Military Nexus with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Tightening Military Nexus with Japan
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea released a commentary on July 2 denouncing the south Korean authorities for tightening the military nexus with Japan.
					 The commentary accused the Japanese government of deciding on July 1 to change the interpretation of the Constitution to allow the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense". This is an act of threatening the peace and security in Northeast Asia, it added.
					
					 If Japan's exercise of "its right to collective self-defense" is allowed, it will deepen the military contradiction among countries in Northeast Asia and facilitate arms race and the U.S. will require Japan's "Self-Defense Forces'" participation in its operations to carry out its strategy, it noted.
					
					 Nevertheless, the present regime is seeking closer military nexus with the U.S. and Japan and helping Japan in its moves to rearm itself, it charged.
					
					 The regime should not opt for stepping up the efforts to share military information with the U.S. and Japan and build a missile shield but for putting an end to the military confrontation on the Korean peninsula and achieving peace there, the commentary stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Judicial Authorities' Ruling to Close Media under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Judicial Authorities' Ruling to Close Media under Fire
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea issued a statement on July 2 denouncing the judicial authorities for making a decision to cancel the registration of the internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 The statement accused the judicial authorities of making a decision to cancel the registration of Jaju Minbo, on charges that it posted literature benefiting enemy and an article dealing with the suspicion that the regime was concealing the cause of the ferry Sewol accident.
					
					 This is a hideous action of trampling down the right of the people by invoking the "Security Law" and stamping out the media, it charged.
					
					 It said Jaju Minbo is the media for reunification and patriotism which has worked hard to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, landmarks for reunification.
					
					 The progressive and fair-minded people of all social standings in south Korea strongly condemn the authorities' decision to close Jaju Minbo, it said, stressing that it would struggle to achieve the freedom of expression and press and bring earlier the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Members of Teachers Union Release 2nd Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
Members of Teachers Union Release 2nd Declaration on Situation
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a press conference in Seoul on July 2 and released the second declaration on the situation signed by more than 12,000, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					The declaration said they could not but note with resentment when they knew that greedy capitalists, corrupt bureaucrats and irresponsible and incapable "government" were behind the truth of the ferry Sewol disaster. It recalled that at least 15,000 teachers under Jongyojo released a declaration on the situation in demand of the proper settlement of the disaster in May. It went on:
					
					 However, the state investigation for probing the truth behind the case dragged on, making no progress. The demand of the bereaved families and people for instituting a special law was disregarded. 
					
					 We cannot but question if the chief executive has even an iota of the will to thoroughly probe the truth, punish the chief culprit and take measures to prevent recurrence of disasters. 
					
					 After the disaster everything contrary to expectations is taking place. The "government" authorities issued warrants of arrest for workers struggling for their vital rights at random while putting spurs to denationalization of medical service. They outlawed Jongyojo in disregard of the recommendations of international bodies. 
					
					 Teachers of Jongyojo will turn out in actions, the declaration added.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Trying to Justify Its Participation in War
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Trying to Justify Its Participation in War
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation in south Korea grouping at least 120 organizations for national movement held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on July 1.
					 At the press conference the organization condemned Japan for trying to justify its participation in war by allowing the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" through the reinterpretation of the "Pacifist Constitution" which stipulates Japan's renouncement of a war and bans it from having access to army.
					
					 It demanded Japan deeply repent of the crimes committed by it against the Korean nation in the past and make an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 It lashed out at the U.S. for instigating Japan to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" which will bring the atmosphere of war to Northeast Asia.
					
					 Then, a written protest addressed to the Japanese prime minister was read out.
					
					 That day, representatives of the Council of Bereaved Families of Men of Merit for Independence, the Federation of Homogeneous Nation Movement Organizations and other organizations for national movement and religious organizations also protested against Japan's decision to reinterpret the Constitution.

articles.title: Organization for Supporting Korean Schools in Japan Formed
articles.content:
Organization for Supporting Korean Schools in Japan Formed
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Ibaragi Society for Defending Rights of Children of Korean Schools, an organization for supporting Korean schools, was inaugurated in Ibaragi Prefecture, Japan.
					 The inaugural meeting took place at the Tsuchiura Citizens Hall in the prefecture on June 26.
					
					 The contents of activities of the organization and its rules were announced at the meeting.
					
					 The organization declared that it would request the Japanese government to give the students of the  Korean schools an opportunity to  receive education on an equal footing, positively conduct activities for letting broad segments of Japanese people know about the Korean schools, organize study session on Korean schools, learn Korean culture and deepen exchange.
					
					 The meeting elected co-representatives and advisers of the organization. 
					
					 Choe In Thae, principal of Ibaragi Korean Primary and Senior High School, gave a lecture.
					
					 It was followed by a social gathering.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Eulogize Last Autograph of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Eulogize Last Autograph of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Juche idea followers looked round the monument to the last autograph made by President Kim Il Sung on a historic document concerning Korea's reunification at Panmunjom, the monument  telling about his patriotic and noble intention. 
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said;
					
					 The monument is the immortal one which offers a good opportunity to know well about the great revolutionary life of the President who devoted his all to the reunification of the country.
					
					 The world can hardly find such a great man as the President who breathed his last in his office while working hard for the country's reunification and happy life of the people. 
					
					 No one can quell the ardent desire of the Korean people to achieve independent reunification, determined to carry out the President's last instruction at any cost.
					
					 Elena Bavichi who visited the DPRK at the head of the delegation of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, sincerely hoped that Korea's reunification, the President's lifelong desire, would be achieved at an early date.
					
					 Tatiana Zaitseva who visited the DPRK at the head of the delegation of the February 16 Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus, noted: The shining successes made in the history of Korea's reunification movement would be unthinkable without the immortal feats of the President. We will extend positive support and encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the patriotic autograph left by the peerless great man powerfully encourages the Korean nation in the struggle for achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will dynamically advance along the road of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation and Koreans in Russia held an event at the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos dealing with undying revolutionary feats of the President who wisely led the socialist revolution and construction and the movement for national reunification, always finding himself among service personnel and people.
					
					 Also on display there were famous works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books on the leadership feats of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu and magazines and albums reflecting the reality of the homeland.
					
					 Present there were officials of Koreans organizations in Maritime Territory of Russia, Koreans in Russia and the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the full-length picture of the President and Kim Jong Il standing together on Mt. Paektu in the name of Koreans organizations in Russia and Koreans in Russia and bouquets before paying tribute.
					
					 Then followed a film show.
					
					 At the remembrance meeting speakers praised the President as the peerless patriot who liberated the country and glorified the dignity of socialist Korea as the country of Juche.
					
					 The President devoted his all to the reunification of the country all his life, they said, adding the document examined by him in the last period of his life is the one related to national reunification.
					
					 They said that they would positively conduct the patriotic movement for reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by British Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by British Personages
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Personages of the British political circles made public statements on June 20 and 29 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said that Kim Il Sung was not only a great revolutionary and prominent thinker and theoretician but also a brilliant strategist who beat back formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great man who proved in practice for the first time in history the truth that the popular masses can do anything when they are aware of their own strength, the general secretary said.
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea and built Korean-style socialism, which are the eternal treasures of progressive humankind, he noted.
					
					 The President's revolutionary cause was successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il, he stressed, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il foiled the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and turned it into a nuclear weapons state and a military power.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would as ever achieve successes in the building of a thriving nation and in the confrontation with the U.S. as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), praised Kim Il Sung for founding the undying Juche idea to indicate the road to be followed by humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania, Benin, Ethiopia and Libya in the period between June 17 and 26 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Party for Socialist Choice of Romania who doubles as chairman of the Romanian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung made the following report:
					
					 H.E. Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, liberated Korea by leading the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and built on the land of Korea a genuine socialist state in which people became its masters.
					
					 The Korean people are holding the President in high esteem as the father of socialist Korea and creating miracles and innovations in the economic construction under the leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The sacred revolutionary career of the President and his exploits will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by other progressive people of the world.
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism- Kimjongilism said that there was no such a prominent leader and a great revolutionary as the President who glorified the 20th century with his outstanding ideology and leadership and noble virtue from his teens to the advanced age of 80.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea noted that the President's beaming image as the benevolent father of the people will be kept forever in the hearts of progressive mankind.
					
					 Members of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association and the Sunbula International Friendship Club of Libya praised the exploits performed by the President and his greatness.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Libya.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in various countries on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were held by the Socialist Party of Romania, the Diversity Party of Indonesia, the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. of Indonesia and an Angolan transport company in the period between June 20 and July 1.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a peerless great man who made an immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence.
					
					 History never knows such a genuine leader of the people and great leader as Kim Il Sung who devoted his life to the prosperity of the country and nation after embarking on the road of the revolution in his early years.
					
					 He made an immortal contribution to the global cause of independence, holding high the banner of independence all his life.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania and all the members of the party pay the noblest respects to Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 Harinde Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, noted that the President was a peerless great man who is boundlessly revered by progressive mankind century by century.
					
					 He stressed that the cause of the President is being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de desembarco
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de desembarco
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de desembarco en la isla de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					En la ocasion se movilizaron los combatientes de las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC, los canones de diversos calibres, los buques de guerra como submarinos, las escuadrillas de cazas, bombarderos y aviones de transporte.
					
					El Comandante Supremo dio la orden de inicio tras escuchar el parte sobre el plan de ejecucion del entrenamiento en el puesto de vigilancia.
					
					En un abrir y cerrar de ojos, se levantaron una tras otra en la isla "enemiga" las columnas de llama.
					
					Al ver los fuertes golpes sucesivos que se dan en la operacion conjunta bien planificada conforme a las exigencias de la guerra moderna, el Comandante Supremo dijo que si escogen correctamente el momento de ataque y abren el fuego intensivo asegurando la velocidad, la exactitud y la simultaneidad, se puede desbaratar a los enemigos.
					
					Terminado el fuego de artilleria, comenzo el desembarco de la infanteria combinado con la accion de los infantes paracaidistas.
					
					Observando con binoculos a los combatientes que ocupan la isla a modo de relampago, el Comandante Supremo elogio a ellos diciendo que estos guerreros capaces de la pelea de uno vs. cien enemigos ejercitaron de dia y noche conscientes de que no se puede dejar para manana los preparativos de combate.
					
					Se dispararon los cartuchos de senal que anunciaban la ocupacion total de la isla y el fin de combate.
					
					El Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho por la marcha exitosa del entrenamiento en que se materializaron los metodos de combate del Juche.
					
					A bordo de un buque, paso revista a las naves de guerra participantes en la operacion felicitando por el exitoso entrenamiento.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en consolidar y desarrollar mas el EPC como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias invictas.
					
					La historia demuestra que si no fortalecen las fuerzas armadas, no se puede defender el destino de la patria y el pueblo, puntualizo y subrayo la necesidad de dar mas acicate al aumento de las fuerzas armadas que significan la soberania del pais y la nacion y el poderio estatal.
					
					Es necesario intensificar los ejercicios que son clave del aumento de capacidad militar, asevero y ordeno que eliminen el formalismo, el dogmatismo y el dandismo en el entrenamiento y mejoren constantemente la forma, el contenido y el metodo de entrenamiento conforme a las demandas de guerra moderna.
					
					Siempre hay que tener presente que el entrenamiento es combate real, apunto y destaco la necesidad de organizar en el futuro mucho mas entrenamientos como el realizado hoy.
					
					Todo el ejercito debe defender firmemente el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la patria socialista vigilando agudamente todos los movimientos de los enemigos, subrayo.
					
					Ahora las aguas del frente sudoeste de nuestra sagrada patria se ven amenazadas ocasionalmente por culpa de un punado de los enemigos, dijo y recordo el reciente incidente peligroso en que cayeron en nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales los proyectiles enemigos. Agrego que lo considera muy grave y espera la oportunidad de darles la leccion a los enemigos, y declaro en tono severo que si los enemigos repiten la mala opcion en un dia mal escogido en la zona maritima candente, les hara arrepentirse para siempre.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pyon In Son, primer subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC y director de su buro de operaciones.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Yongsong Min Ok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Yongsong Min Ok
Hanggu, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 4 los alimentos de cumpleanos a la longeva centenaria Yongsong Min Ok quien vive en el barrio de Sangbisok del municipio de Hanggu de la ciudad de Nampho.
					Nacida hace un siglo en una familia obrera de Tokio de Japon, ella se traslado con su padre a Corea y despues de casarse con un coreano, emigro a China.
					
					En el 38 (1949) de la Era Juche, regreso a la RPDC con su esposo y disfruto de una vida feliz en el regazo del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria dedico todo su empeno por la victoria de la guerra a cambio de su marido caido en el frente.
					
					El partido le cuido atentamente para que ella  llevara una vida comoda.
					
					La abuela trabajo con sinceridad para la patria socialista y no dejo el trabajo aun en la edad jubilada.
					
					Ahora, lleva una vida laboriosa y optimista y prefiere comer pescados y verduras.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario internacional via Internet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en seminario internacional via Internet
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviaran el 28 de junio pasado los participantes en el seminario internacional via Internet, abierto con motivo del 20o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					La misiva notifica la celebracion del foro para recordar al Presidente, venerado por la humanidad como el mejor de los grandes hombres del siglo 20. 
					
					Agrega que los participantes elogiaron mucho las proezas del Presidente y de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il quien hizo gran aporte a la justicia y la paz del mundo.
					
					Manifiesta el apoyo total y la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir un Estado prospero y lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria, uniendose firmemente en torno a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Apunta que gracias a Su Excelencia, avanzaran por la unica senda de victoria la justa causa del pueblo coreano y la de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero y vendra sin falta el dia en que toda la humanidad viva en el nuevo siglo de independencia. 
					
					Concluye afirmando que los remitentes apoyaran todas las lineas y politicas a ser presentadas por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un y estaran siempre al lado del pueblo coreano que cuenta con su sabia orientacion.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita campos de construccion
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita campos de construccion
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion de la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong y de remodelacion del Estadio Primero de Mayo.
					Durante su recorrido, el estimulo a los constructores que crean nuevo milagro mediante la innovacion colectiva en acato a las instrucciones del Mariscal Kim Jong Un dadas en el terreno.
					
					Exhorto a acelerar la construccion en el maximo nivel garantizando la calidad e introducir avanzados metodos de construccion.
					
					Tomo las medidas para suministrar en lo suficiente los materiales necesarios a los trabajos de acabado.

articles.title: Desarrollado nuevo lubricante refrigerador  para maquinas herramientas CNC
articles.content:
Desarrollado nuevo lubricante refrigerador  para maquinas herramientas CNC
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- La Compania de Desarrollo de Aparatos de Evaporacion de Pyongyang invento el lubricante refrigerador soluble en agua para las maquinas herramientas CNC.
					El nuevo lubricante desempena el papel de lubricacion, refrigeracion, lavado y prevencion de erosion en el proceso de elaboracion metalica.
					
					Los investigadores de la compania desarrollaron este liquido combinando el polifosfato y varias materias adicionales para que surta al maximo el efecto de su capacidad.
					
					El invento permite elevar mas la velocidad de elaboracion de corte metalico, alargar el periodo de uso de aparatos y prevenir la erosion de los elaborados.
					
					Ademas, reduce la cantidad de calor que se crea en el curso de elaboracion y elimina sin reservas las virutas y polvos metalicas.
					
					El liquido goza de buena reputacion en el Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean  y otras unidades.
